title: dzungmobile
author: dzungmobile
content: Signature disabledMixer signature campaign banForum seized by '3 digits' entitiesCampaign managers for mixers will be temporarily banned 6 monthsParticipants in mixer campaigns will be temporarily banned 3 month + signature ban 2 yearsWhat's more?Please show me your guess for tomorrow.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Doesn't this type of topic where people are trying to guess what will happen on April 1st kinda ruins the experience? Imho, better just wait and see what theymos prepared than speculate about it.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Tomorrow is March 31, nothing will happen.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Do you know something that we don't or did you forget that March has 31 days in its calendar month ?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on March 30, 2023, 09:24:39 AMTomorrow is March 31, nothing will happen.Well, he's got April 1st coming up tomorrow. The man can't wait for that long-awaited day to arrive, he's even made up his own calendar

comments.author: Zwei
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on March 30, 2023, 09:16:46 AMForum seized by '3 digits' entitiesSir, you are mistaken, there are no "3 digits" entities, its all in your head.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Zwei on March 30, 2023, 10:17:40 AMSir, you are mistaken, there are no "3 digits" entities, its all in your head.KFC rings a bell?

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Tomorrow you can still breathe freely to face the next month. lolWe are waiting to see how theymos make the forum even crazier.April fool before.[April fools] New new rank requirementsIntroducing NFTs for forum members

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: You forgot:Spammers will continue to spam BitcointalkBounty campaigns will continue to invite shitposters as everSomeone will lose money with a random casinoAIs will continue to merit usersSomeone's going to complain on this board because they were banned for plagiarismThe forum will not be upgraded to new softwareSatoshi's skull will be resurrectedOP, think beyond signature campaigns.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on March 30, 2023, 11:14:50 AMMaybe OP live on city or country which has timezone UTC+15 , which means March 30, 2023 09:16:46 AM (UTC Time) is equal to March 31, 2023 00:16:46 AM (UTC+15 Time).P.S. It's a joke, UTC is ranging from -12 to +14. Although this forum let you enter 15 hours as the time offset.Good math and hidden fact that I even did not know.Quote from: BenCodie on March 30, 2023, 09:27:48 AMDo you know something that we don't or did you forget that March has 31 days in its calendar month ?I was in a space-time room when I made the post, that's why  Quote from: salad daging on March 30, 2023, 11:01:18 AMTomorrow you can still breathe freely to face the next month. lolWe are waiting to see how theymos make the forum even crazier.April fool before.[April fools] New new rank requirementsIntroducing NFTs for forum membersYou did not do your search home work well  [Compilation] All pranks that was made by theymos

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: You are painting a too scary and terrible picture for tomorrow, but we continue to believe in a brighter future. After the events with the closure of the well-known mixer, it is possible that the forum will stop advertising mixers.I see no reason to cancel signatures.Regarding the ban of managers and signatures, it also sounds doubtful.In fact, it is impossible to predict what will happen tomorrow. Perhaps a new day will come.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: m2017 on March 30, 2023, 12:04:33 PMAfter the events with the closure of the well-known mixer, it is possible that the forum will stop advertising mixers.The forum has already stopped advertising everything ever since Theymos pulled down banner ads months ago.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: I think that the OP has already started celebrating and decided to suggest ideas for the administrator.But in the five years that I've been here, I can say that all the April Fool's jokes were unique, and we can hardly predict this.In the meantime, we can say with the hope that tomorrow is Friday; in my country, this is the end of the working week, which is also a long-awaited day.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: My goodness, I was kinda shocked when I saw this post. Like seriously, what will happen tomorrow?I almost thought OP was going to tell us exactly what would happen tomorrow, well anything can happen tomorrow but we pray for good though. Tomorrow is the end of the month and I just wish the price of Bitcoin goes higher than it is now and also get more higher till we jump into April, I just wish tomorrow will be a start of surprises (positive surprises) for Bitcointalk members.

comments.author: zaim7413
comments.body: Tomorrow will be as usual, nothing special happened in the forum. Forum users are still eating and drinking as usual, after finishing a cigarette they will start posting as usual. Don't forget to make a cup of coffee so that the atmosphere is more relaxed to invite imagination which can produce quality posts.I think that's what will happen tomorrow.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on March 30, 2023, 09:16:46 AMSignature disabledMixer signature campaign banForum seized by '3 digits' entitiesCampaign managers for mixers will be temporarily banned 6 monthsParticipants in mixer campaigns will be temporarily banned 3 month + signature ban 2 yearsWhat's more?Please show me your guess for tomorrow.  There's Nothing more just that life goes on. Don't be pessimistic with your post, always remain optimistic in all you do. This post absolutely negative minded in all ramifications. The absence of mixer and signature campaign entirely will never bring down the forum. The forum was working fine before the introduction of signature and will continue on that path even after signature are ban either temporarily or permanently. The initial was to acquire knowledge and the forum will continue to serve that purpose it was designed for.

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: OP seems to have forgotten that March is on the 31st day. Many have thought of many things for April Fools. Estimates will be published on 1st April. Of course we have to be ready to enjoy the fun.We have to prepare for the surprise on April 1st Saturday.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Curiosity about your question prompted me to consult the omniscient AI, and this is what I have found:Q: What will happen tomorrow?Quote from: ChatGPTAs an AI language model, I don't have the ability to predict the future with certainty. The future is always uncertain and there are many factors that can influence what will happen tomorrow.However, based on past experience, we can make some assumptions or predictions about what might happen. For example, the sun will rise in the morning and set in the evening, people will continue to go about their daily lives, and various events and activities may take place.It's important to remember that unexpected events can also occur, and these can change the course of what will happen tomorrow. Therefore, it's always a good idea to be prepared for different scenarios and be adaptable to changing situations.Well, it seems like the only things we can really count on are the sun rising in the morning, setting in the evening, and people going about their daily routines. As for everything else, it's just a guessing game.

comments.author: RapTarX
comments.body: What about a new mixer getting launched? I don't see a lot of negativity for tomorrow; I don't expect it ever. We are going to have new mixing site endorsed by bitcointalk and theymos. The name will be BITCOINTALKMIXER.com for clearnet and bitcointalkmixerdoesntexistinrealityyouarebeingfooledasthisisapril1st.onion for TOR. There will be a signature campaign managed by theymos & payment will be automatic with Bitcointalk NFT minted on Binance Chain (you know the fee is cheaper there, why spend a lot).

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on March 30, 2023, 09:24:39 AMTomorrow is March 31, nothing will happen.This one of the most savage responses I've seen in the forum in recent times and I see no reason why one should ever have such imaginations in his head, man is there truly something you know that we all don't know or do you have a special calendar already for the April fool's day ?Just a very funny and straight to the point response from@ Apocallapse
